name: E-Commerce DevOps Implementation
description: Architected scalable cloud infrastructure on AWS EKS with Terraform and Kubernetes. Automated deployments via GitHub Actions/Argo CD, accelerating release cycles by 30% and ensuring 99.9% uptime during peak loads.

name: ColorSense
description: Developed an AI-powered web app using Next.js and Google AI that generates color hex codes from text, reducing design time by 20% and improving color accuracy.

name: KDM Engineers Website Redesign
description: Modernized KDM Engineers' website with responsive UI/UX, boosting mobile engagement by 40% and improving page load speed by 50%, leading to a 15% increase in contact form submissions.

name: Epic Questers Mobile App UI/UX
description: Designed user-centric UI/UX for a local activity discovery mobile app, creating flows and prototypes in Figma based on user research. Aimed at increasing user retention by 25% through intuitive navigation.

name: ToDo App
description: Engineered a full-stack task management app (MERN) with authentication, categories, and theme switching, enhancing user productivity by an estimated 30% based on feature adoption in user testing.

name: Vishnu Wellness Healthcare Platform
description: Developed a high-performance healthcare platform featuring appointment scheduling and resource management, achieving sub-2-second load times and a 95% mobile-friendly score, improving user satisfaction by 20%.

name: MLRIT MUN Event Website
description: Built a responsive event website with user registration and schedule management for a Model UN conference, handling 500+ registrations and achieving a 90% mobile usability score.
